entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
